item.description:
The October 17 mobilization planning committee will meet this Saturday, Sept 12, 1-4pm, at Encuentro 5 (33 Harrison Ave., fifth floor, Chinatown).

Attendance by phone is possible but must be pre-arranged. Please email rozziecole (at) gmail (dot) com if you are thinking of joining by phone.

Topics of this meeting will include:

1. Adoption of the final demands
2. Authorization of invitations to speakers and performers
3. Approval of the outreach flyer
4. Review of outreach status and plans
5. Review of logistics status and plans
6. Finance
7. Peacekeeping
8. Post-Action Evaluation Meeting
item.name: Planning meeting for 17 October antiwar action
